name: @uswitch/koa-core
description: An example project showing the user of all core `@uswitch/koa` libraries

scripts.audit: ROOT=`pwd`; for l in packages/koa*; do cd $ROOT/$l; echo "Auditing: $l"; npm audit; cd $ROOT; done
scripts.ls:packages: ROOT=`pwd`; for l in packages/koa*; do cd $ROOT/$l; echo "npm ls: $l"; npm ls; cd $ROOT; done
scripts.preversion: node ./__scripts__/doc-dependencies.js; node ./__scripts__/doc-internal-packages.js; git commit README.md -m '[core] Update readme with latest dependencies'
scripts.update:manual: node __scripts__/update-dependencies.js; git commit package.json package-lock.json -m '[core] Update package dependencies'
scripts.postpublish:packages: npm update; git commit -am '[core] Update dependencies'
